ValidationRule.description: Created as part of SFS-8738 .Validation rule to ensure user clears the FSM_TMASiteClear__c (ie. sets it to FALSE) if the FSM_TMAActualStop__c = NULL
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNULL( FSM_TMAActualEnd__c ), FSM_TMASiteClear__c = TRUE, NOT($Permission.FSM_SystemAdmin), NOT($Permission.FSM_Integration), NOT($Permission.FSM_Data_Migration_Admin) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please reset the Site Clear when clearing the TMA Actual End.
